title: Four cheese pasta bake
ingredients: ['240ml milk', '240ml double cream', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '165g grated Provolone or mozzarella cheese', '140g grated mozzarella cheese', '135g grated Emmental or Gruyere cheese', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheesee', '2 egg yolks, beaten', '225g penne pasta', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
